sentences.english: 20 the lampstands of pure gold with their lamps, to burn in front of the inner sanctuary as prescribed;
sentences.chinese: 并精金的灯台和灯盏，可以照例点在内殿前。

sentences.english: Its wick trimmers and trays are to be of pure gold.
sentences.chinese: 灯台的蜡剪和蜡花盘也是要精金的。

sentences.english: Of a talent of pure gold shall he make it, with all these vessels.
sentences.chinese: 作灯台和这一切的器具要用精金一他连得。

sentences.english: And being turned, I saw seven golden candlesticks;
sentences.chinese: 既转过来，就看见七个金灯台。

sentences.english: He shall order the lamps upon the pure candlestick before the LORD continually.
sentences.chinese: 他要在耶和华面前常收拾精金灯台上的灯。

sentences.english: L is for the Lampstand, one church in each city shining.
sentences.chinese: 是灯台，一城一召会照亮。

sentences.english: Of a talent of pure gold made he it, and all the vessels thereof.
sentences.chinese: 他用精金一他连得作灯台和灯台的一切器具。

sentences.english: Of a talent of pure gold made he it, and all the vessels thereof.
sentences.chinese: 他用精金一他连得作灯台和灯台的一切器具。

sentences.english: And the tongs thereof, and the snuffdishes thereof, shall be of pure gold.
sentences.chinese: 灯台的腊剪和腊花盘也是要精金的。

sentences.english: A talent of pure gold is to be used for the lampstand and all these accessories.
sentences.chinese: 做灯台和这一切的器具要用精金一他连得。

sentences.english: A lamp had been knocked over, and the throw rug was wadded against one wall.
sentences.chinese: 一具灯台倒着，小地毯卷靠在墙边。

sentences.english: A talent of pure gold was used for the lampstand and its various appurtenances .
sentences.chinese: 为做灯台和一切用具，用了一塔冷通纯金。

definition: fire and candles/household things that burn
altar lamp burning day and night
